dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] datingdiret.com]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, September 27, 2004 8:51 AM
To: Legal Response
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] datingdiret.com]

Forwarding to Legal for review.


-------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] datingdiret.com
Date:         Mon, 27 Sep 2004 12:20:57 +0100
From:         Adlex Solicitors <cjo@adlexsolicitors.co.uk>
Organization:         Adlex Solicitors
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>
CC:         domains@quigibo.com



27 September 2004



The Planet.com Internet Services, Inc

1333 North Stemmons Freeway

Suite 110

Dallas TX

75207

USA


Dear Sir



*datingdiret.com*



We act for DatingDirect.com Limited.



We believe from our investigations that you host the website
www.datingdiret.com.



We attach a copy email concerning trade mark infringement and passing
off sent to the owner/operator of the site today.



You are now on notice concerning this infringement. Unless you take down
this website by the close of business on *11 October 2004 *our client
will include you in legal proceedings to be issued against Digi Real
Estate Foundation.  Those proceedings will include an application for an
injunction and for payment of damages and our client
